sentence: Short on staff left waiting for breakfast as one staff member seemed to be the only one on duty no clean tables in food area no cups or plates never has a service hotel been so shabby for a four star never again will my company send staff to stay again as service was not even to a one star holiday in iran
Will defiantly return next trip to Liverpool
We stayed at this hotel for the bank holiday Monday celebrations of the 3 Queens
For instance we missed breakfast on Tuesday because they did not tell us Monday breakfast was weekend hours due to the Bank Holiday
We could not fault itNothing bad about our trip
I strayed on my last trip and stayed at a different hotel but lesson learned and I will never do that again
However we enjoyed our stay and would recommend for familys
Their attitude more than anything else made a difficult family situation bearable allowing us to relax at the end of difficult days
Long time IHG member and stayed in a number of the partner hotels in the group but first time in a Staybridge Liverpol
it is was hard to find at first and my family and I could not even get our breakfast and there is only 1 elevator for 5 floors and the room was too small and inconvenient
The staff were AMAZING made my birthday trip special
Just one night in Liverpool for a football match we found the Staybridge Suite at a reasonable price we had stayed with this group previously in the US and had been very happy
We were a family group staying for a few nights in a one bedroom suite and in a studio suite
Stayed here last Friday excellent value for money was priced similar to Crown plaza and holiday in but was far superior plus full facilities to make it feel like a home from home
Business trip to conference at ACC you could not stay closer than this
Fabulous bank holiday weekend
Like I said it should have been a 5 star as customer service was good and it is excellent for family
Perfect venue for a romantic getaway
I would definitely stay again and recommend to family and friends
Booked 2 suites for a family of 5 and one of the bedrooms had a wonderful view of the ferries wheel at the docks
